Room.Name: Hans' and Frans' Workout Gym
Room.ShortDescription: This is where Hans and Frans come to work up a sweat.
Room.LongDescription: This room is filled with literally tons of workout equipment. The eastern wall is mirrored to allow exercisors to get positive feedback during their workouts. In the southwest corner you see Frans, Hans' twin brother, pressing with all his might on the bench press machine. A ventilator in the roof gently blows fresh air around the room, lessening the stench from Frans' armpits. Emanating from a powerful set of loudspeakers is the raucous of rock music. You flex in the mirror and notice how puny your muscles look in comparison to Hans' and Frans' iron biceps.
